name: Charlie (IMelker)
description:
Simple 2D game based on pathfinding. Throw balls and the dog will chase them. Press floor buttons to turn off electic barriers. 

For Wowie Jam 4.0

Used Resources:

  • PixelDogs asset: https://benvictus.itch.io/pixel-dogs
  • 200 Free SFX asset: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
  • SimpleMenuSystem from GodotASssetLib by Voaz
  • RobotTileSeet https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset
  • MainCharacter https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-extra-animations-for-platformer-characters
  • SpeechBubble https://github.com/Harrison-Miller/SpeechBubble
  • Navigation2d https://github.com/viniciusgerevini/godot-navigation-2d-example
  • Background art https://ru.pinterest.com/pin/hendry-roesly-on-twitter--227783693639263703/
